IP address or FQDN from the device: IP address or FQDN from the device
TCP port (default: 4352, some older devi: TCP port (default: 4352, some older devices have: 10000)
maximum 32 ASCII Characters (could be le: maximum 32 ASCII Characters (could be left empty if projector security is set to OFF)
select the maximum supported class from: select the maximum supported class from the projector
sets the socket to timeout after timeout: Sets the socket to timeout after timeout milliseconds of inactivity on the socket. Default: 800
interval to refresh the status (power, e: interval to refresh the status (power, e.g. input switch and mute). Default: 2000 ms (2 seconds)
interval to refresh the whole projector: interval to refresh the whole projector status, default 60000 ms (1 minute))
time to recheck the projector connection: time to recheck the projector connection after a connection failure. Default: 10000 ms (10 Seconds)
Select the type of query for all informa: Select the type of query for all information types and choose whether power state must be in state Power-on prior to that query. If the query is only on startup and the power state must be in state Power-on, then the query will be executed on first power on, only one time after the adapter has been restarted
Power state must be ON to query: Power state must be ON to query
Optionally customize your signal inputs: Optionally customize your signal inputs and transfer this to the object (pjlink.x.input), so that you have a validation in the object database and a dropdown menue to select your input
Get the actual input configuration from: Get the actual input configuration from the projector and transfer this object to the inputInfo to customize the inputs
Overwrite the existing inputInfo configu: Overwrite the existing inputInfo configuration ? You must leave and reenter the instance configuration dialog !
Set the instance input object to fit the: Set the instance input object to fit the upper edited inputs
Set the instance input object to default: Set the instance input object to default
Overwrite the existing input configurati: Overwrite the existing input configuration ? Don't forget to restart the instance after saving to reload the config object to the instance !
